description: Adapted from German Pädophilie, bringing its spelling into conformity with pedo- +‎ -philia. Compare the Byzantine Greek παιδοφιλία (paidophilía, “love of children”).

nouns.description: pedophilia (countable and uncountable, plural pedophilias) (American spelling)

entries.meaning: Sexual attraction to children by adults.
examples: Coordinate terms: hebephilia, ephebophilia, pederasty, korephilia, teleiophilia

entries.meaning: (by extension) Sexual activity between adults and children; the act of child molestation.
